CustomField.description:
"Whether the publicity clause was preserved in our contract.
This determines whether we are allowed to publicize our relationship (e.g. use their logo on our website, do a case study, etc.)"
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
"Whether the publicity clause was preserved in our contract.

CustomField.label: Publicity
